column2: §RWARNING: CPU-Heavy!§!\nEvery living character's §Yspecial CSH traits§! will be §Gupdated§! §Rimmediately§! (instead of the usual gradual updates throughout the year).
(CSH) Remove all traits and disable updates
Every living character's §Yspecial CSH traits§! will be §Gupdated§! at a random time once per year
Every living character will §Rstop§! having §Yspecial CSH traits§! added or updated
Every living character's §Yspecial CSH traits§! will be §Rremoved§!
